box1.heading: MICROCREDENTIALS
box1.text: They Are Intended To Certify Career Paths And Skills For The Workplace. They Also Apply To Short Course And Professional Update Cycles

box2.heading: PROOF OF PARTICIPATIONS
box2.text: NFTs Intended To Accredit The Participation Of Members Of The Education Community In Acts And Events Of The Institution.

box3.heading: DISTINCTIONS AND AWARDS
box3.text: Badges That Certify Distinctions And Recognitions Granted By The Institution To Its Teachers Or Students. Medals Of Honor, Best Average, Sports Achievement

box4.heading: UNDERGRADUATE AND GRADUATE DEGREES
box4.text: Qualification Granted By The Institution To Its Students Only (School,University And Postgraduate)

container3.text: Transforming the education ecosystem by issuing authentic and verified credentials and completely negating the possibility of duplicate, fake or fudged documents.

container4.text: THE WAY FOR AN INSTITUTION TO GENERATE UNIVERSITY OR SCHOOL DEGREES IN BLOCKCHAIN

step1.heading: STEP 01
step1.text: The institution buys a plan according to their needs

step2.heading: STEP 02
step2.text: We request the legal information and a note with the legal signature of the highest authority

step3.heading: STEP 03
step3.text: Our company validates the institution as a secure account

step4.heading: STEP 04
step4.text: The institution sends its models of university or school degrees

step5.heading: STEP 05
step5.text: We integrate the models in the platform enabled only for that institution

step6.heading: STEP 06
step6.text: We make a new final validation query to the person in charge designated by the institution

step7.heading: STEP 07
step7.text: We enable the form so that the institution can complete it individually and issue the certificates
